title: Why did Jeremy Lin's run with the Knicks end prematurely?
explanation: Lin suffered a meniscus tear, ending his magical run.

title: Which Patriots player intercepted Russell Wilson in Super Bowl XLIX?
explanation: Malcolm Butler secured the game-winning interception.

title: Which running back was controversially not handed the ball at the goal line for Seattle?
explanation: Marshawn Lynch not running it led to controversy.

title: Who hit a game-tying home run for Cleveland in Game 7 of the 2016 World Series?
explanation: Rajai Davis tied the game against the Cubs in the 8th inning.

title: What historic drought did the Cubs end in the 2016 World Series?
explanation: The Cubs ended a 108-year championship drought.

title: What event gave the Cubs a vital breather before extra innings in 2016 Game 7?
explanation: A 17-minute rain delay let the Cubs regroup.

title: If Messi had not won the 2022 World Cup, which debate would likely continue?
explanation: Messi’s win has helped settle the Messi vs. Ronaldo GOAT debate.

title: Kylian Mbappé scored how many goals in the 2022 World Cup final?
explanation: Mbappé scored a hat trick in the 2022 final.

title: Tiger Woods’s 2019 Masters win was his first major after how many years?
explanation: He won his first major in 11 years at Augusta.

title: Which Masters champion was seen sipping wine while Woods finished his 2019 win?
explanation: Danny Willett was watching TV with his green jacket on.

title: Ray Allen made his legendary three-pointer for which team?
explanation: Allen’s shot came for the Miami Heat in 2013.

title: Allen’s game-saving three came after arena officials did what?
options: Cordoned off the court with ropes
explanation: Arena staff began preparing the court with ropes for a Spurs win.

title: If Spurs had won the 2013 Finals, which coach might have been fired according to the text?
explanation: Spoelstra's job may have been at risk had the Heat lost.

title: Which player returned a missed field goal 109 yards for 'The Kick Six'?
explanation: Chris Davis completed the unforgettable return.

title: The Kick Six ended which rivalry game in incredible fashion?
explanation: It happened in the Iron Bowl between Auburn and Alabama.

title: Who called the Kick Six 'the greatest finish in any sporting event I’ve ever witnessed'?
explanation: Verne Lundquist was so moved he'd recall it as the greatest finish.

title: Which swimmer anchored the US relay to gold in the 2008 Beijing Olympics?
explanation: Jason Lezak’s anchor leg preserved Phelps's gold streak.

title: Rowdy Gaines doubted which athlete's quest for eight golds during the relay?
explanation: Gaines thought Phelps's dream of eight golds was likely finished.

title: Who was Curt Schilling’s bloody sock opponent in the 2004 ALCS?
explanation: The storybook 'bloody sock' performance occurred at Yankee Stadium.

title: What unlikely event did the Red Sox achieve in the 2004 ALCS?
options: Winning after being down 3-0 in a series
explanation: Boston became the first MLB team to win a series after trailing 3-0.

title: Which player was central to 'The Block' in the 2016 NBA Finals?
explanation: LeBron’s chase-down block was the signature play.
